name: Bloom Swap
description:
Get ready for the most addicting flower blaster game! Explore the lovely flower garden and match your way through hundreds of beautiful levels filled with exciting quests and fun puzzles. Immerse yourself in fun and adventure, swipe and blast 3 flowers or more of the same color to unlock special surprises and clear the board.

Train your brain and warm up your fingers to beat all the challenges. Improve your matching skills and connect beautiful flowers and buds to a blitz- it’s easy just to pick up and play!

Addicted to match 3 games?
Bloom Swap is the best flowers game in the play store! This incredible puzzle game will give you hours of exciting fun with specially designed puzzles that can all be beaten using cool boosters and power-ups, and, of course, some excellent matching skills. You’ll be blasting the colorful flowers by swapping power-ups together in this incredible adventure.

✿ Bloom Swap Addictive Features:
• Fun flower game that is easy to learn but can be challenging to master!
• Stunning graphics and designs. Explode in the blossoming flower garden and discover awesome features and effects.
• Hundreds of addicting levels filled with fun puzzles and brain teasers.
• Free to play blossom game. Play whenever and wherever you’d like, no wifi or internet connection is needed.
• Cool boosts and power-ups to help you blitz the flowers and win levels.
✿ How to Play this Amazing Garden Game:
• Swap 3 or more flowers to win and advance to the next level. Start this unlimited free fun, swapping, matching and blasting three or more pretty flowers in vertical or horizontal lines and crush them.
• Explore thousands of blooming levels in this amazing flower game, and you will never feel bored again!
• Swap, crush and blast the flowers with special boosters that will help you solve the puzzles and brain teasers.
• Create flower blast combos to achieve high scores and get 3 stars.
• Prepare yourself to face many flowery obstacles and challenges.
• Finish the level with the least moves possible to get higher scores and 3 stars.



It might look like a simple flower game, but Bloom Swap is challenging to master!


Check Out These Tips:
Be the best flowers gardener - swipe and match as many flowers as possible! But always have a good look for better flowers matches before randomly combining the flowers. Go for the 3 matches that will give you the highest amount of points, and watch your score grow. Matching 4 or 5 items is always better! Also matching 2 boosts with each other will create a major blossom explosion!


Fall in love with this fun match 3 puzzle game! Play now and discover hundreds of blooming levels with lots of blooming missions and cool boosters that make this game one of a kind. Pop, crush and blast lovely flower buds to reach the level target before you run out of moves!

With so many exciting levels, eye-catching graphics and unlimited free fun, it’s a must-have for your mobile device especially if you love free match 3 games.

Download Bloom Swap and join the amazing flower adventure fun!
